TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Obtain a Telegram bot token by contacting @BotFather

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: List down the user IDs who should have permission to use and reply to users, seperated by SPACE. To get user ids, send /id command to Telegram @OwnErObOT

MONGO_URL.description: Get this value from mongodb.com. Make a cluster there and obtain the connection URL

START_COMMAND.description: The command user enters to start the bot. Deafult is 'start'.

REQUEST_INTERVAL.description: Time interval between each check. Default is 300 seconds/ 5 minutes.

TZ.description: Specify timezone so that time realted functions work as needed. Know your timezone from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc .Default is IST.
